title: Window Info API - WindowInfoProvider - Context
content:
<PropName
  name="width"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Window width, in pixels
<PropName
  name="height"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Window height, in pixels
<PropName
  name="--vw"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
CSS variable representing the viewport width
<PropName
  name="--vh"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
CSS variable representing the viewport height
<PropName
  name="breakpoints"
  type="object"
  isContextProp
/>
The results of your breakpoints
<PropName
  name="eventsFired"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Number of animation frames completed
